* Write requirement specifications based on user input into `docs/specs/<feature-name>/requirements.md`.
* Follow the template below for the requirement specifications:

```markdown
# 要求仕様書

## 概要

{{Write a brief description of user's feature request here.}}

## 目的

{{Describe the main objectives and goals of the feature here.}}

## ストーリー

* {{User target 1}}: {{Description of user target 1}}
  * {{Story 1 for user target 1: how this user target will use the feature}}
  * {{Story 2 for user target 1}}
* {{User target 2}}: {{Description of user target 2}}
  * {{Story 1 for user target 2}}
  * {{Story 2 for user target 2}}

## 機能要件

### REQ-1: {{First functional requirement category title}}

| 要件ID | 要件内容 | 優先度 | 備考 |
|--------|----------|--------|------|
| REQ-1.1 | {{Description: Detailed description of this functional requirement.}} | {{Priority: MUST/SHOULD/MAY}} | {{Additional notes if any.}} |
| REQ-1.2 | {{Description}} | {{Priority}} | {{Additional notes if any.}} |

### REQ-2: {{Second functional requirement category title}}

| 要件ID | 要件内容 | 優先度 | 備考 |
|--------|----------|--------|------|
| REQ-2.1 | {{Description}} | {{Priority}} | {{Additional notes if any.}} |
| REQ-2.2 | {{Description}} | {{Priority}} | {{Additional notes if any.}} |

## 非機能要件

| 要件ID | 要件内容 | 優先度 | 備考 |
|--------|----------|--------|------|
| NFR-1.1 | {{Description}} | {{Priority}} | {{Additional notes if any.}} |
| NFR-1.2 | {{Description}} | {{Priority}} | {{Additional notes if any.}} |

### NFR-2: {{Second non-functional requirement category title}}

| 要件ID | 要件内容 | 優先度 | 備考 |
```
